client.apis.v1.tests.test_common_cc_approval 源代码

# -*- coding: UTF-8 -*-
"""
@Summary : 测试通用审批
@Author  : Rey
@Time    : 2022-04-12 15:46:19
@Run     : python manage.py test client.apis.v1.tests.test_common_cc_approval -v=3 --keepdb
"""
from datetime import datetime

from rest_framework import status
from rest_framework.test import APITestCase

from client.apis.v1.tests.base import action_cache
from client.apis.v1.tests import mock_common_cc_approval as mock
from client.models.credit_certificate import (
    CreditCertificate, CreditCurrentNode, FinanceProject, ReviewLog
)
from client.models.evidence import ChainEvidence
from utils.date_and_time import n_hours_later
from utils.jwt_util import user_info_2_token



[文档]class TestCommonCcApproval(APITestCase):
    """test CreditCertificateReviewUpdateAPIView.update
    按照work_flow_id顺序测试
    """
    databases = {'default', 'credible_data'}
    fixtures = (
        'app_menus.json', 'const_company.json', 'const_credit.json', 'location.json', 'business.json', 'work_flow.json',
        'business_map.json', 'const_platform.json', 'evidence_type.json', 'base_common_cc_approval.json'
    )


[文档]    @action_cache
    def client_request(self, uid: int, company_uid: str, cc_id: int, is_ok: bool):
        """封装请求

        :param int uid: 用户id
        :param str company_uid: 公司uid
        :param int cc_id: 某信id
        :param bool is_ok: 是否通过
        :return _type_: _description_
        """
        mock.create_all_users()
        path = f'/api/v1/scf/client/capital/credit_certificates/review/{cc_id}/'
        token = user_info_2_token({'user_id': uid})
        self.client.credentials(HTTP_AUTHORIZATION=f'Bear {bytes.decode(token)}')
        data = {
            "opinion": "dolore",
            "result": "pass" if is_ok else "reject",
            "enclosure": [
                {
                    "file_name": "战家老织世",
                    "url": "http://wedi.na/fwbltzjkn"
                },
                {
                    "file_name": "做例才金观",
                    "url": "http://ujgr.org/uavnaf"
                },
                {
                    "file_name": "她圆过连五强整",
                    "url": "http://hvqfgsk.hr/blwcz"
                },
                {
                    "file_name": "和油果",
                    "url": "http://hcck.tj/xcj"
                }
            ]
        }
        return self.client.put(
            path, data=data, format='json', HTTP_ELAB_COMPANY=company_uid
        )



[文档]    def assertAPIException(self, resp, msg: str):
        """断言AIPIException

        :param _type resp: response
        :param str msg: 错误信息
        """
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
        self.assertIsNone(resp_json['data'])
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], msg)



[文档]    def test_pass_enclosure_upload(self):
        """测试成功通过转让要件上传"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, transfer_items = mock.create_transfer_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.ENCLOSURE_UPLOAD)
        cc = transfer_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(2, 'nLT5cTjGxFGLjNfmFhKnYw', cc.pk, True)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'ok')
        # 日志信息
        self.assertTrue(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                result='pass',
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.ENCLOSURE_UPLOAD.value
            ).exists()
        )
        self.assertFalse(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                work_flow_id__gt=mock.WorkFlowEnum.ENCLOSURE_UPLOAD.value
            ).exists()
        )

        # 未确权
        new_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.get(pk=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.review_status, 'reviewing')
        self.assertIsNone(new_cc.confirm_at)

        current_node = CreditCurrentNode.objects.get(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(current_node.work_flow_id, mock.WorkFlowEnum.TRANSFER_EXAMINE.value)



[文档]    def test_pass_transfer_examine(self):
        """测试成功通过转让审核"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, transfer_items = mock.create_transfer_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.TRANSFER_EXAMINE)
        cc = transfer_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(2, 'nLT5cTjGxFGLjNfmFhKnYw', cc.pk, True)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'ok')
        # 日志信息
        self.assertTrue(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                result='pass',
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.TRANSFER_EXAMINE.value
            ).exists()
        )
        self.assertFalse(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                work_flow_id__gt=mock.WorkFlowEnum.TRANSFER_EXAMINE.value
            ).exists()
        )

        # 未确权
        new_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.get(pk=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.review_status, 'reviewing')
        self.assertIsNone(new_cc.confirm_at)
        expire_at = n_hours_later(datetime.now(), new_cc.credit_certificate_receive_time_limit.value).date()
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.expire_at, expire_at)

        current_node = CreditCurrentNode.objects.get(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(current_node.work_flow_id, mock.WorkFlowEnum.RECEIVE_CONFIRM.value)



[文档]    def test_success_pass_receive_confirm(self):
        """测试转让接收成功"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, transfer_items = mock.create_transfer_cc(credit.pk)
        cc = transfer_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(5, '8aMaYaeNRWQaYTy8Ydm2Hn', cc.pk, True)
        resp_json = resp.json()

        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'ok')
        # 日志信息
        self.assertTrue(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                result='pass',
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.RECEIVE_CONFIRM.value
            ).exists()
        )
        auto_log = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_table='credit_certificate',
            data_id=cc.pk,
            result='pass',
            work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.TRANSFER_COMPLETE.value
        ).first()
        self.assertTrue(auto_log)
        self.assertEqual(auto_log.opinion, '通过')
        self.assertIsNone(auto_log.enclosure)
        self.assertEqual(auto_log.result, 'pass')

        # 确权信息
        new_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.get(pk=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.review_status, 'pass')
        self.assertIsNotNone(new_cc.confirm_at)

        current_node = CreditCurrentNode.objects.get(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(current_node.work_flow_id, mock.WorkFlowEnum.TRANSFER_COMPLETE.value)

        # 确认转让确权数据上链
        self.assertTrue(ChainEvidence.objects.filter(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk, data_type='data', evidence_type_id=mock.EvidenceTypeEnum.TRANSFER.value).exists())



[文档]    def test_success_reject_receive_confirm(self):
        """测试转让接收拒绝"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, transfer_items = mock.create_transfer_cc(credit.pk)
        cc = transfer_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(5, '8aMaYaeNRWQaYTy8Ydm2Hn', cc.pk, False)
        resp_json = resp.json()

        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'ok')
        # 日志信息
        self.assertTrue(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                result='reject',
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.RECEIVE_CONFIRM.value
            ).exists()
        )
        self.assertFalse(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.TRANSFER_COMPLETE.value
            ).exists()
        )

        # 某信信息
        new_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.get(pk=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.review_status, 'reject')
        self.assertIsNone(new_cc.confirm_at)

        current_node = CreditCurrentNode.objects.get(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(current_node.work_flow_id, mock.WorkFlowEnum.TRANSFER_APPLICATION.value)



[文档]    def test_fail_open_platform_review(self):
        """测试失败: 开立平台审批"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        open_items = mock.create_open_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.OPEN_PLATFORM_REVIEW)
        cc = open_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', cc.pk, False)
        self.assertAPIException(resp, '无法进行平台审核。')



[文档]    def test_success_pass_approval_review(self):
        """测试开立资金方审批成功"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        open_items = mock.create_open_cc(credit.pk)
        cc = open_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', cc.pk, True)
        resp_json = resp.json()

        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'ok')
        # 日志信息
        self.assertTrue(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                result='pass',
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.APPROVAL_REVIEW.value
            ).exists()
        )
        auto_log = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_table='credit_certificate',
            data_id=cc.pk,
            result='pass',
            work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.OPEN_HOLD.value
        ).first()
        self.assertTrue(auto_log)
        self.assertEqual(auto_log.opinion, '通过')
        self.assertIsNone(auto_log.enclosure)
        self.assertEqual(auto_log.result, 'pass')

        # 确权信息
        new_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.get(pk=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.review_status, 'pass')
        self.assertIsNotNone(new_cc.confirm_at)

        current_node = CreditCurrentNode.objects.get(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(current_node.work_flow_id, mock.WorkFlowEnum.OPEN_HOLD.value)

        # 确认开立付款承诺函上链
        self.assertTrue(ChainEvidence.objects.filter(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk, data_type='file', evidence_type_id=mock.EvidenceTypeEnum.PAY.value).exists())
        # 确认开立确权数据上链
        self.assertTrue(ChainEvidence.objects.filter(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk, data_type='data', evidence_type_id=mock.EvidenceTypeEnum.OPEN.value).exists())



[文档]    def test_success_reject_approval_review(self):
        """测试开立资金方审批拒绝"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        open_items = mock.create_open_cc(credit.pk)
        cc = open_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', cc.pk, False)
        resp_json = resp.json()

        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'ok')
        # 日志信息
        self.assertTrue(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                result='reject',
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.APPROVAL_REVIEW.value
            ).exists()
        )
        self.assertFalse(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.OPEN_HOLD.value
            ).exists()
        )

        # 智信状态
        new_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.get(pk=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.review_status, 'reject')
        self.assertIsNone(new_cc.confirm_at)

        current_node = CreditCurrentNode.objects.get(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(current_node.work_flow_id, mock.WorkFlowEnum.OPEN_APPLICATION.value)



[文档]    def test_success_pass_fin_fund_side_review(self):
        """测试融资资金方审批成功"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, finance_items = mock.create_finance_cc(credit.pk)
        cc = finance_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', cc.pk, True)
        resp_json = resp.json()

        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'ok')
        # 日志信息
        self.assertTrue(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                result='pass',
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.FIN_FUND_SIDE_REVIEW.value
            ).exists()
        )
        auto_log = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_table='credit_certificate',
            data_id=cc.pk,
            result='pass',
            work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_SETUP.value
        ).first()
        self.assertTrue(auto_log)
        self.assertEqual(auto_log.opinion, '通过')
        self.assertIsNone(auto_log.enclosure)
        self.assertEqual(auto_log.result, 'pass')

        # 未确权
        new_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.get(pk=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.review_status, 'reviewing')
        self.assertIsNone(new_cc.confirm_at)

        current_node = CreditCurrentNode.objects.get(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(current_node.work_flow_id, mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_SETUP.value)



[文档]    def test_success_reject_fin_fund_side_review(self):
        """测试融资资金方审批拒绝"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, finance_items = mock.create_finance_cc(credit.pk)
        cc = finance_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', cc.pk, False)
        resp_json = resp.json()

        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'ok')
        # 日志信息
        self.assertTrue(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                result='reject',
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.FIN_FUND_SIDE_REVIEW.value
            ).exists()
        )
        self.assertFalse(
            ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                data_id=cc.pk,
                work_flow_id=mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_SETUP.value
            ).exists()
        )

        # 未确权
        new_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.get(pk=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.review_status, 'reject')
        self.assertIsNone(new_cc.confirm_at)

        current_node = CreditCurrentNode.objects.get(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(current_node.work_flow_id, mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_APPLY.value)

        finance_project = FinanceProject.objects.filter(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk).first()
        self.assertEqual(finance_project.status, 'backed')



[文档]    def test_fail_finance_platform(self):
        """测试失败: 融资平台审批"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, finance_items = mock.create_finance_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_PLATFORM)
        cc = finance_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', cc.pk, False)
        self.assertAPIException(resp, '无法进行平台审核。')



[文档]    def test_fail_transfer_expire(self):
        """测试失败: 转让达到接收时限"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, finance_items = mock.create_transfer_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.RECEIVE_CONFIRM, expire_timedelta=-3)
        cc = finance_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', cc.pk, False)
        self.assertAPIException(resp, '已经超过接收时限')



[文档]    def test_fail_open_expire(self):
        """测试失败: 开立达到接收时限"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        open_items = mock.create_open_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.OPEN_EXAMINE, expire_timedelta=-3)
        cc = open_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', cc.pk, False)
        self.assertAPIException(resp, '已经超过接收时限')



[文档]    def test_fail_clear_done(self):
        """测试失败: 已经清分"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        open_items = mock.create_open_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.OPEN_EXAMINE, clear_status='done')
        cc = open_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', cc.pk, False)
        self.assertAPIException(resp, '已经清分无法审核')



[文档]    def test_fail_clear_ready(self):
        """测试失败: 即将清分"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        open_items = mock.create_open_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.OPEN_EXAMINE, clear_status='ready')
        cc = open_items['cc']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', cc.pk, False)
        self.assertAPIException(resp, '信用凭证即将清分，无法审核')
